page.title: 11A COLEHILL GIRL'S DAY.
page.content: I get up at quarter past seven in the morning and have a wash and get ready for school, then I have my breakfast of cereal, toast and milk. I walk to school nearly every day. School starts at 8.55.a.m. On a Friday morning we have a spelling and tables test and then we have P.E. We put out apparatus and then choose what we want to have a go on first. Next we have our assembly and then it is playtime. I play with my friends Debra, Lisa and Caroline. After play we have handwriting and we write out a poem.At midday we have lunch and in the afternoon we choose a game to play indoors. We have another playtime at 2.30.p.m.and go home at 3.20.p.m. I have my tea and watch television before I go to bed. CLARE JENNINGS. AGED 9 YEARS.
